entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
